article: What Does It Mean When a Bird Flies Into Your House?
intro: Many people believe that birds symbolize freedom, hope, and new beginnings, and seeing one fly into your home could hold deep meanings for your life, such as encouraging you to make a change or follow your intuition. In this article, we’ll uncover all the different meanings of a bird flying into your home, including what different species symbolize across the world.

points.name: Spiritual Meanings of a Bird Flying Into Your House

steps.title: There may be a negative event in your family.
steps.subtitle: In some cultures, a dark bird flying into the house signifies bad fortune, illness, or death in the family. While there’s no proven way to predict bad luck, pay attention to any recurring dreams or gut feelings that won’t go away—it could be your subconscious mind trying to warn you.
sub-points: Fortunately, knowing that bad luck is heading your way can help you prepare for it! Keep  in your room or  to ward off negative energy.

points.name: Symbolism & Cultural Meanings of Specific Birds
Is a bird flying into your home a good or bad omen?
What if a bird flies into the side of your house?

steps.title: If a bird flies into the side of your house or window, it’s time to make a change.
steps.subtitle: Birds symbolize freedom because of their ability to soar into the skies, so seeing one fly into your window or the side of your house could be a wake-up call to take action. Challenge yourself and  to achieve everything you want in life!
sub-points: If you feel stagnant in your career, for example, find ways to level up or switch industries—ask for feedback on your performance, , or  on the side.
